about_me.title: About Me
about_me.text1: Hi, I'm Nurzhanat Zhussup, a passionate software engineer and data scientist with a deep curiosity for technology. I'm {{age}} years old and born in Almaty, Kazakhstan ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡¿â›°ï¸
about_me.text2: I am currently based in Vienna, Austria ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡¹. I hold a degree in Economics from WU Vienna, which initially steered me towards a career in finance or the economics field. However, after taking a data science specialization, I discovered my love for coding. As I explored more of the tech world, my passion for programming grew stronger. I then realized that I truly wanted to be in the tech industry, which sparked my transition into software engineering. Since then, I have gained extensive skills in web development, focusing on both frontend and backend technologies. Additionally, with my specialization in data science, I possess strong knowledge of Machine Learning and Data Engineering. So, briefly speaking, I am just a guy who enjoys building things and learning something new. :)

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.text1: I absolutely love skiing â›·ï¸, and it's probably on the same level as coding for me, as I can't imagine my life without these two. :) In addition to skiing, I enjoy playing tennis and hiking. I also frequently watch Udemy courses as part of my self-development. Additionally, I like spending my time reading tech books to further expand my knowledge. Outside of these activities, I stay curious about the latest trends in technology and continuously seek new ways to improve both professionally and personally. Whether it's tackling a coding challenge or exploring the outdoors, I'm always looking for new experiences to grow and learn.

links.title: Links
links.text1: Either on the left side or above (depending on the device you're reading this on), you can find the most important links to get to know me better. I would highly encourage you to check out the projects section, where you can find the projects I am most proud of. Also, if you're interested, there is a CV section you can check out as well.
links.text2: It was a pleasure sharing a bit about myself with you! :) I hope you enjoyed my little story. Hit these little LinkedIn or Email icons in the footer section to stay connected ðŸš€
